title: Enterprise Sales Enablement
shortDescription: Create compelling sales materials for enterprise AI/automation deals.
description: Equip your sales team with everything they need to close enterprise deals. This playbook helps PMs create ROI calculators, competitive battle cards, demo scripts, and objection handling guides. Essential for companies with long enterprise sales cycles and multiple stakeholder buy-in requirements.

prompts.note: Define buyer personas: economic buyer, technical buyer, end user
Create competitive analysis and battle cards
Develop pricing strategy and packaging for enterprise tiers
Build ROI calculator and value quantification framework
Generate messaging and positioning for enterprise buyers
Analyze deal patterns and create playbook for common scenarios

prerequisites: Access to win/loss data and sales feedback
